content: row single_crochet 12 stitches slip_stitch in next stitch fasten_off leaving long yarn tail finish stuffing and sew on to cat using photos to help with positioning back legs make 2 round 1 using white 6sc into magic_ring round 2 increase around 12 stitches round 3 increase 2sc around 16 stitches rounds 4-6 single_crochet around 16 stitches round 7 8sc change to grey decrease four times 12 stitches rounds 8-17 single_crochet around round 18 decrease 4sc twice 10 stitches round 19 decrease 3sc twice 8 stitches slip_stitch in next stitch fasten_off stuff paws lightly stuff legs whip stitch sides of round 19 together sew onto cat using picture for positioning sew top edge of leg to body of the cat towards the paw leaving the paw free this is to keep the leg in position tail lightly stuff as you go round 1 6sc into magic_ring round 2 increase single_crochet repeat around 9 stitches round 3 single_crochet around 9 stitches round 4 increase 2sc repeat around 12 stitches round 5 single_crochet around round 6 increase 3sc repeat around 15 stitches rounds 7-15 single_crochet around 15 stitches round 16 decrease three times 3sc increase three times 3sc 15 stitches rounds 17-24 single_crochet around 15 stitches round 25 decrease three times 3sc increase three times 3sc 15 stitches rounds 26-29 single_crochet around 15 stitches copyright copyright belongs to me laura gillard dated june 2016 you may not publish copy or distribute this pattern in any form you are welcome to sell items made from this pattern please credit me laura gillard or laura s pixie patch as the designer contact details you are welcome to contact me with any questions with this pattern through etsy messages by emailing lauraspixiepatch@gmail com or on my facebook page www facebook com/lauraspixiepatch i would love to see pictures of your finished horses and unicorns
